channel.title: Projects on Jose Hernandez
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Jose Hernandez

item.title: Shared bikes predictor
item.description: Rented bikes is a service who has gained popularity recently. While a sunny and fresh day can be the best scenario to go and take a ride, weather is a tricky factor, rain and snow are impediments to rent bikes. So, in order to make sure we can supply enough bikes per country we need to find a way to predict the demand. Let’s ride through data and discover a solution!

item.title: Space X rocket landing predictor
item.description: The Space X company offers their service of special missions and have rockets with a cost of 62 million dollars, they save a lot of money because the rocket’s first stage is reusable if landing successfully, since the most popular model is Falcon 9, we’re going to focus on this rocket model. The Space X webpage contain many features of all the space mission made up until today that can help us in order to predict if the first stage will land successfully and save a lot of money to the company.
